translations: 捕食；掠夺；坑害；困扰（prey 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 成为...的牺牲品；深受...之害

sentences.sentence: Even the sinister bio-mimicry of the Preying Mantis, luring unsuspecting pollinators to their death, has a beautiful symmetry to it.
sentences.translation: 即使是邪恶的捕食螳螂，它用以引诱不知情者上钩的拟态，也是一个美丽的对称形态。

sentences.sentence: Bogus social workers have been preying on old people living alone.
sentences.translation: 冒牌社会福利工作员不断坑害独居老人。

sentences.sentence: Preying mantis made using pea pods and edamame.
sentences.translation: 豌豆皮和毛豆做的螳螂。
